processors.name: InvokeHTTP
processors.comments:
This processor calls the Microsoft Graph API to list files in the specified OneDrive folder.
The response will contain file metadata including IDs and download URLs.

processors.name: SplitJson
processors.comments:
This processor splits the array of text chunks into individual flowfiles.
Each output flowfile will contain a single chunk with its metadata.

processors.name: InvokeHTTP
processors.comments:
This processor downloads the actual file content from OneDrive using the file ID.
The downloaded content will be in the original file format (DOCX/PPTX).

attributes-to-log-regex.displayName: Attributes to Log by Regular Expression

processors.name: GenerateFlowFile
processors.comments:
This processor generates a trigger flowfile every minute to start the OneDrive file scanning process.
The flowfile contains a timestamp of when the scan was initiated.

processors.name: UpdateAttribute
processors.comments:
This processor adds processing status attributes to the flowfile after successful upload to Weaviate.
It timestamps the processing completion and marks the status as success for tracking purposes.

processors.name: SplitJson

Each output flowfile will contain metadata for a single file.
